snippet: Shares of the oil field services companies Halliburton and Baker Hughes traded higher after the government sued to block them from combining.
abstract: Stocks rise, buoyed by drug and health care shares, following two-days slump.
lead_paragraph: Shares of the oil field services companies Halliburton and Baker Hughes traded higher after the government sued to block them from combining.

headline.main: Health and Energy Stocks Lead Wall Street Higher
headline.print_headline: Oil Prices Jump, and Shares on Wall Street Follow Suit
